title: FS: Complete N162 Goodwin and N28, N29 Allen & Ginter Baseball Sets
author: piecesofthegame

posts.post_title: FS: Complete N162 Goodwin and N28, N29 Allen & Ginter Baseball Sets
posts.post_content:
Just a shot in the dark, but worth throwing it out there…

PLEASE READ FIRST!!
Thinking about making a major purchase so offering this 19th Century package deal for $30K. I’m looking for an IN PERSON CASH transaction in the Northeast. I would consider breaking into two lots, Goodwin and A&G, but not interested in breaking into individual cards. Just seeing if the funds are there for this purchase I have in mind. If not, I’ll survive, so not willing to haggle. Have fun finding these cards offered as a set. 
Most are low grade, a few are raw. Several “Authentic” holders, some have back damage. Key cards are decent, although N162 Anson has significant back damage. Additional pics by request. Here are a few key cards. PLEASE only inquire if you are serious. This will only be available for a few days, then the window closes.
Plenty of references here. Thanks!
